title: Christmas 1976 Letter
subject: Mission; Family Life; Christmas; Local Culture
location: Oran, Algeria; Tlemcen, Algeria; Morocco; Lyon, France
creator: Butler, David; Butler, Carol
description: Letter about celebrating Christmas in 1976, including a family trip to Morocco. Also updates on the logistical issues the church has been facing with transportation for parishioners to and from the church for activities.

title: Ourselves in relation to the Lebanese Tragedy Letter
subject: History; Politics (International)
creator: Butler, David; Butler, Carol
description: Letter discussing the history of Israel and Palestine in relation to the 1982 Lebanon War, including the United States' responsibility in military and economic support for Israel and how the Arab populations tend to view Americans and America as a whole.
contentwarning: Mentions of religious percecution; Descriptions of violence; Allusions to war

title: Summer of '85 - Update on car project & ecumenical ministry Letter
subject: Mission; Little Sisters of Jesus
location: Iowa, United States; Algiers, Algeria; Sahara Desert; Tlemcen, Algeria; BÃ©char, Algeria; Oran, Algeria
creator: Butler, David; Butler, Carol
description: Letter recounting several trips, including a "barnstorm" around Iowa to speak with many churches about their work, and two trips taken back in Algeria with their new car to share in Christian fellowship with more distant friends.

title: The Muslim feast of sacrifice - (Abraham's sacrifice) Letter
subject: Christmas; Local Culture
creator: Butler, David; Butler, Carol
description: Letter describing and contemplating the slaughter of sheep for the yearly Muslim celebration of the "Festival of Sacrifice."

title: Christmas Greetings 1986 Letter
subject: Mission; Family Life; History; Protestant Church of Algeria
location: Kansas, United States; Oran, Algeria; Cameroon; Madagascar; Chad
creator: Butler, David; Butler, Carol
description: Letter recounting Carol's brief trip back to the States for a ceremony at her alma mater, some history on the Protestant mission in Oran, and the stories of two of their parishioners referred to as "H. M." and "P. B."

title: 1989 update/Economic & Pol. changes/Am. Police Brutality Letter
subject: Politics (Algerian); Family Life; Local Culture
creator: Butler, David; Butler, Carol
description: Letter explaining the recent political changes in Algeria and the new groups/parties that have emerged. In the States, their second eldest son had an upleasant encounter with the police while taking a walk in a park at night.

title: How the third world (and especially the Arab world) sees us Letter
subject: History; Politics (International); Mission
location: United States; Afghanistan; Palestine; Israel; Iran
creator: Butler, David; Butler, Carol
description: Letter discussing the history of the relations between the Arab world and the West, including the many perceived betrayals during and after the World Wars.
contentwarning: Allusions to religious persecution, Mentions to violence

title: More on our ecumenical ministry/Family/New car project Letter
subject: Mission; Family Life
location: Tennessee, United States; Arizona, United States; Kansas, United States; Algiers, Algeria; Oran, Algeria
creator: Butler, David; Butler, Carol
description: Letter giving updates on their four sons, now all back in the States for university and the two oldest pursuing grad school. Also introduces the new car project and updates on Carol's work teaching English.

title: Annual conference/U.S. visit/The difficult situation here Letter
subject: Mission; Protestant Church of Algeria
location: Schaffhausen, Switzerland; Germany; Paris, France; Iowa, United States; Kansas, United States; Arizona, United States; Tennessee, United States; Oran, Algeria
creator: Butler, David; Butler, Carol
description: Letter detailing their trip to Switzerland for the Annual Conference, followed by a whirlwind trip of visiting friends, family, and churches throughout Paris, England, and North America. Then they discuss the changing political climate of Algeria.

title: New Address 1979 Letter
subject: Mission; Family Life
location: Oran, Algeria; Lyon, France; New York, United States; Pennsylvania, United States; Colorado, United States; Kansas, United States; Iowa, United States; Montreal, Canada
creator: Butler, David; Butler, Carol
description: Letter informing of their move and change in address, as well as other family and health updates and a trip back to the States over the past summer.
